title: Almost 88 GW thermal capacity to be added to meet rising power demand: R K Singh
description: The minister said 27,180 MW of thermal capacity is under construction, another 12,000 MW has been bid out and 19,000 MW is under clearance. The total anticipated thermal capacity addition by 2031-2032 will be 87,910 MW.
